backend/main.mo: Defines core data types and modules for products, carts, wishlists, lookbook images, user sessions, site content, and integrates authorization and migration logic.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration function that overwrites stored admin credentials with new default email and password values.
feature_evidence.json: Placeholder feature evidence report containing an empty features list.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for documentation or planning purposes.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file defining the WhatsApp number used for checkout messaging.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, component, and utility layers with extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application managing routing, page state, and query client configuration across all user and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/HomepageBa: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting homepage banners, including image upload, text encoding, and destination settings.
frontend/src/components/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout component handling admin session login, logout, authorization checks, and rendering of admin-side navigation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying navigation links, social icons, branding, and invoking navigation callbacks.
frontend/src/components/GuestMergePrompt: Shows a dialog prompting users to merge guest cart or wishlist items into their account and triggers confirm or skip actions.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main site header with navigation, search, theme toggle, and guest cart/wishlist counts, including mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageBan: Renders a rotating homepage banner carousel with navigation, decoded text, and route handling. Supports auto-advance, manual controls, and click actions based on banner destination.
frontend/src/components/home/HomepageSec: Displays homepage content sections with optional titles, images, and text, filtering out empty sections. Includes a call-to-action button leading to the About page.
frontend/src/components/MediaSlotUploade: Handles image upload, preview, replacement, and removal using ExternalBlob with progress tracking and toasts.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product with hover image swap, badges, quick view, and guest cart/wishlist actions.
frontend/src/components/RichTextEditor.t: Provides a simple rich text editor with formatting controls and editable content synced to parent state.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, recreating it on identity change. Invalidates dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session state and login/logout operations using backend authentication. Updates stored session and invalidates relevant queries on login.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestCart.ts: Provides local guest cart state with add, remove, and clear operations. Persists cart changes to local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestWishlist.ts: Manages a guest wishlist stored in local storage with add, remove, and clear functions. Ensures wishlist items are unique.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomepageBanners.ts: Offers queries and mutations for managing homepage banners, requiring admin auth for write operations. Automatically invalidates banner and site content queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identity restoration. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes identity and login states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides product, search, and admin product management queries and mutations using the backend actor. Also contains stubs for cart operations and invalidates caches on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteContent.ts: Provides React Query hooks to load, publish, and toggle dark mode for site content using an authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useThemeMode.ts: Manages theme mode with localStorage overrides and applies light/dark classes based on site content.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a premium light/dark theme palette with gold-accented utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/About.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details, values, and product imagery for the brand.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Builds category statistics from all products and provides searchable, sortable category listings in the admin panel.
Shows high-level product, category, and lookbook statistics plus quick navigation actions for admin users.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLookbook.t: Manages lookbook images with search, sorting, upload/edit dialogs, and tagging products in the admin interface.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProducts.t: Admin interface for listing, searching, sorting, creating, editing, and deleting products with image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSessions.t: Displays session and privacy info with placeholder analytics for user sessions, carts, and wishlist data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin UI page for editing site content, managing banners, theme settings, and publishing or saving drafts.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Displays the shopping cart using guest cart data, allowing item removal and navigation to product or catalog pages.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Shows an order summary and generates a WhatsApp checkout link based on guest cart items.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Displays contact details from site content and includes a styled contact form for user messages.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero, category cards, and featured product sections, using navigation callbacks and product queries.
frontend/src/pages/Lookbook.tsx: Displays a grid of lookbook images with a modal for details and tagged products, sourced from lookbook and product queries.
frontend/src/pages/ProductCatalog.tsx: Provides a filterable and sortable product catalog with category, type, and usage filters, rendering results as product cards.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Shows detailed product information with image gallery, size/color selection, and add-to-cart or wishlist actions.
frontend/src/pages/Returns.tsx: Static returns and exchanges page outlining policies and steps for initiating returns.
frontend/src/pages/Shipping.tsx: Static shipping information page detailing delivery times, packaging, processing, tracking, and policy details.
frontend/src/pages/Wishlist.tsx: Displays wishlist items by fetching saved product IDs and rendering matching ProductCards, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthError.ts: Parses backend admin auth errors into stable types for UI messaging.
frontend/src/utils/adminSession.ts: Handles storing, retrieving, and clearing admin session data in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/bannerDestination.ts: Encodes, decodes, and handles navigation behavior for banner destination metadata.
frontend/src/utils/bannerEncoding.ts: Serializes and deserializes banner text data with fallback handling.
frontend/src/utils/localCart.ts: Manages guest cart storage with versioning and BigInt-safe serialization.
frontend/src/utils/localWishlist.ts: Manages guest wishlist persistence with versioning in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/siteContentDefaults.t: Provides default site content values including hero text, contact details, and banners.
frontend/src/utils/storefrontNav.ts: Defines storefront navigation structure and homepage category cards with associated filters.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Builds a WhatsApp checkout URL with formatted order details.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, containers, animations, and extensions.
project_state.json: Defines project metadata, known issues, and new feature requests focused on fixing admin authentication and improving related UI error handling.
